results.title: Main differences between two highly effective lipid-lowering therapies in subclasses of lipoproteins in patients with acute myocardial infarction
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ of both sexes admitted with their first @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ and submitted to pharmacoinvasive strategy (N = 101) were included and randomized using a central computerized system to receive a daily dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg plus @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ 10 mg or @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ 20 mg for 30 days.

results.title: Compound Danshen Dripping Pill inhibits hypercholesterolemia/atherosclerosis-induced heart failure in ApoE and LDLR dual deficient mice via multiple mechanisms
results.text_hl: Compound @CHEMICAL_danshen_dripping_pill @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000604051 @@@Danshen Dripping Pill@@@ (CDDP) or CDDP combined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ has been widely used to treat @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ and other @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@ in China.

results.title: Monocytes presenting a pro-inflammatory profile persist in patients submitted to a long-term pharmacological treatment after acute myocardial infarction
results.text_hl: Before the invasive procedure, they were randomized using a central computerized system (battle-ami.huhsp.org.br) in a 2x2 factorial design to be treated with @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ 20 mg or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg plus @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ 10 mg, as well as @CHEMICAL_Ticagrelor @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077486 @@@ticagrelor@@@ 90 mg or @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@ 75 mg, in addition to routine therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@AMI@@@.

results.title: A bioinformatics approach to identifying the biomarkers and pathogenesis of major depressive disorder combined with acute myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: This study investigated the pathogenesis of @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder_Major @DISEASE_MESH:D003865 @@@major depressive disorder@@@ (@DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder_Major @DISEASE_MESH:D003865 @@@MDD@@@) and @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@acute myocardial infarction@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@AMI@@@) using bioinformatics.

results.title: Association of Baseline Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol and Percentage Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol Reduction With Statins, Ezetimibe, and PCSK9 Inhibition.
results.text_hl: DESIGN, SETTING, AND PARTICIPANTS: This secondary exploratory study analyzed data from 3 randomized placebo-controlled clinical trials (Aggrastat to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Zocor@@@-@<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@Thrombolysis in Myocardial Infarction 21@@@ [A to Z-TIMI 21], Improved Reduction of Outcomes: Vytorin Efficacy International Trial [IMPROVE-IT], and Further Cardiovascular Outcomes Research With @GENE_PCSK9 @GENE_255738 @@@PCSK9@@@ Inhibition in Subjects With Elevated Risk [FOURIER]) of @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@-lowering therapies (statin, @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@, and a @GENE_PCSK9 @GENE_255738 @@@PCSK9@@@ inhibitor) and included participants with @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Marcusa DP, Giugliano RP, Park JG, de Lemos JA, Cannon CP, Sabatine MS. results.title: Psychological and pharmacological interventions for depression in patients with coronary artery disease.
results.text_hl: The evidence was very uncertain for end-of-treatment effects on all-cause mortality, and data were not reported for end-of-treatment cardiovascular mortality and occurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ for this comparison.
